configuration.tbelDecoder:
// Decode an uplink message from a buffer
// payload - array of bytes
// metadata - key/value object

/** Decoder **/

// decode payload to string
var payloadStr = decodeToString(payload);

// decode payload to JSON
 var data = decodeToJson(payload);

//var deviceName = 'Inverter1';

// Result object with device/asset attributes/telemetry data
var result = [{

,{deviceName: 'Mal_Device',deviceType:'inv_agg',
  telemetry: {
     
      PV_Daily_Energy_Today:((data[0].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[1].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[2].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[3].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[4].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[5].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[6].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[7].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[8].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[9].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[4].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[5].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[10].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[11].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[12].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[13].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[14].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[15].data.Day_kWh/100)),
      
      PV_Total_Energy_kWh:((data[0].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[1].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[2].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[3].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[4].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[5].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[6].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[7].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[8].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[9].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[4].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[5].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[10].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[11].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[12].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[13].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[14].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[15].data.Total_kWh/100)),
      
      INV_Total_Power:((data[0].data.Active_kW/1000)+(data[1].data.Active_kW/1000)+(data[2].data.Active_kW/1000)+(data[3].data.Active_kW/1000)+(data[4].data.Active_kW/1000)+(data[5].data.Active_kW/1000)+(data[6].data.Active_kW/1000)+(data[7].data.Active_kW/1000)+(data[8].data.Active_kW/1000)+(data[9].data.Active_kW/1000)+(data[4].data.Active_kW/1000)+(data[5].data.Active_kW/1000)+(data[10].data.Active_kW/1000)+(data[11].data.Active_kW/1000)+(data[12].data.Active_kW/1000)+(data[13].data.Active_kW/1000)+(data[14].data.Active_kW/1000)+(data[15].data.Active_kW/1000)),
      
      Specific_Yield:((data[0].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[1].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[2].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[3].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[4].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[5].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[6].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[7].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[8].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[9].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[4].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[5].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[10].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[11].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[12].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[13].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[14].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[15].data.Day_kWh/100))/660,
      
      CUF_AC : (((data[0].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[1].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[2].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[3].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[4].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[5].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[6].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[7].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[8].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[9].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[10].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[11].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[12].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[13].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[14].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[15].data.Total_kWh/100))/ (365*24*660)) * 100,
      
      CUF_DC : (((data[0].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[1].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[2].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[3].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[4].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[5].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[6].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[7].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[8].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[9].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[10].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[11].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[12].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[13].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[14].data.Total_kWh/100)+(data[15].data.Total_kWh/100))/ (365*24*744.8)) * 100,
   
      CO2_EmissionsKg_Saved : ((data[0].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[1].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[2].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[3].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[4].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[5].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[6].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[7].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[8].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[9].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[4].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[5].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[10].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[11].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[12].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[13].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[14].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[15].data.Day_kWh/100))*392/1000,
      
      AVG_Volt_Line : (data[0].data.Ubc/10 + data[1].data.Ubc/10 + data[2].data.Ubc/10 + data[3].data.Ubc/10 + data[4].data.Ubc/10 + data[5].data.Ubc/10 + data[6].data.Ubc/10 + data[7].data.Ubc/10 + data[8].data.Ubc/10 + data[9].data.Ubc/10 + data[10].data.Ubc/10 + data[11].data.Ubc/10 + data[12].data.Ubc/10 + data[13].data.Ubc/10 + data[14].data.Ubc/10 + data[15].data.Ubc/10) / 16,
      
      AVG_Amps_Line : (data[0].data.Ib/1000 + data[1].data.Ib/1000 + data[2].data.Ib/1000 + data[3].data.Ib/1000 + data[4].data.Ib/1000 + data[5].data.Ib/1000 + data[6].data.Ib/1000 + data[7].data.Ib/1000 + data[8].data.Ib/1000 + data[9].data.Ib/1000 + data[10].data.Ib/1000 + data[11].data.Ib/1000 + data[12].data.Ib/1000 + data[13].data.Ib/1000 + data[14].data.Ib/1000 + data[15].data.Ib/1000) / 16,
      
      PV_Energy_Cost : (((data[0].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[1].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[2].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[3].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[4].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[5].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[6].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[7].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[8].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[9].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[4].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[5].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[10].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[11].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[12].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[13].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[14].data.Day_kWh/100)+(data[15].data.Day_kWh/100))*3.86), //25 cents/kwh PV Maldives converted to Maldives currency
  }}
   

   ];

/** Helper functions 'decodeToString' and 'decodeToJson' are already built-in **/

return result;
